scenario_text.value: Hm? Is that...
Saki! Miu! What are you two doing here?
What took you so long, Takuma?!

What were you thinking, getting separated in
such a weird place?!
I’m sorry...
Takuma... I can’t get up...
What? Where are you hurt?!

No, I’m not hurt...not like that. But I feel
just awful.
I, I saw visions of...Shuuji and Ryo!
Ah...

I was close to them both, and I was so happy
when I thought they were still alive...
But I failed them! I failed both of them!

Saki, you have to stop! Blaming yourself
isn’t going to do you any good.

Hey, Saki! Hating yourself won’t make
anything better.
Now come on, get up! Help me find my brother!

Takuma, don’t you just stand there, either!
Give Saki a hand!
Right, okay.
(Something seems off about this.)

(Something about this just doesn’t seem
right. Why can’t I put my finger on it?)

Takuma... Dontcha think they’re acting funny?
Watching them gives me the heebie-jeebies.
Thank you, Agumon...

(If Agumon thinks so, it can’t just be my
imagination.)
(Something’s off with these guys!)

What’re you gawking there for, Takuma?! Hurry
up and help Saki!

Uh, Shakomon, did you always have such
a sharp tongue?
Uh, say what?

I mean, you always tells it like it is, but
with a certain amount of kindness...
And was Saki always so soft-spoken?

Wha... How rude! Even I get down and out
sometimes!

I just saw Shuuji and Ryo, you know! They
were all, join us in the fog, and stuff!

I’ve seen Saki depressed. She wasn’t as
pessimistic as all this.

You’re being weird too, Floramon. You two are
acting more like Aoi and Labramon.
Hey, that’s not...

And Miu, were you always such a worrywart?
You’re acting more like your brother.

Why is everyone just a little bit different?
It’s almost like...
You’re bits and pieces of the people I know.

You’re not my real friends, are you! Are you
illusions, too?!
Aw, he figured it out.

And I thought we were doing such a good job,
too.
Let’s kill him.
Yes, let’s take him out.
Stand back, Takuma! Here they come!
